attributes.action: Target those on our roads with no insurance, tax, licenses or M.O.T's, not the law abiding.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Would this Government not be better targeting those who illegaly use our roads on a daily basis instead of trying to target the law abiding citizens in this country.  Create a robust database that tracks every vehicle to ensure that it is taxed, legal, roadworthy and insured.  Another example of this Government being miles out of touch with the vast majority of the population.  Do not let this Government take away our freedom and right to drive.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
